File System

You can map the following virtual paths (ex. /virtual/photos/) to specific locations on your drive.

You may specify any valid URI location (ex. http://domain.com/files).

Empty values will cause the virtual routes to point to your relative location.

Application Configuration

This section is a graphical representation of your configuration file. It is color coded to indicate success / failure. Expand each node to see the details.

The colors represent the following:

  • Validation passed
  • Validation failed
  • Node is missing, but not required

Pseudo-application - "#application-name"(#application-id),
has been tried to launch by launch() API.
Due to Web Simulator is lightweight development tool which only support single application instance at one time.
Please click the following button to return the original application.
 
 
Application - #application-name(#application-id), has been tried to #application-operation by #application-operation() API.
Please click the following button to #application-verb the original application.
